item.description:
If you're in this group you're old enough to know what this is and if you haven't experienced this show by now you should... the show is a movie - a movie that flopped.  A theater operator in California decided to run it at midnight and the crowd that came began to interact with the movie in a manner that would launch a cult classic.  People dress up for this movie, bring props, and the audience acts out parts of the movie.  Bizarre but fun.

If you need a list of props this video is a must see...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lSveMOO4X54

NOTE:  YOU MUST BE A PAID UP MEMBER TO ATTEND.  If you haven't paid the $10 group fee for the first half of 2013 DO NOT RSVP.  NO refunds for non-members.

Tickets are $12.00 plus 2.95% PayPal and a $0.35 transaction fee.

AMC Boston Common 19(19.9 mi)

Boston, MA
Phone: (617) 423-5801
Weekly: Sat: 12:00 Mid
Shadowcast: The Full Body Cast

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Rocky Horror Picture Show - yes it's still around!
